testcase.name: HomeController Index should render the index page
UserController GET /users/register should render registeration form
UserController POST /users/register should accept registeration post form with valid data
UserControler POST /users/login should Log a valid user in

testcase.name: UserControler POST /users/login should reject an valid user in

failure.message:

constraint.minLength

constraint.required
constraint.minLength
constraint.required
error.required
constraint.minLength
constraint.maxLength
constraint.required
